hints.content:
On a clock there are two hands. The $\redD{\text{hour hand}}$ is the shorter hand.  The $\blueE{\text{minute hand}}$ is the longer hand.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 5. The long minute hand points to 12. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45a764740b107b33cf6707c08fe70c7abdbda8c9)

$\redD{10}{:}{\blueE{10}}$ is $\blueE{10}$ ticks from $\redD{10}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 10. The long minute hand points to 2.  Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/561045dc30cf2becdcd3714fb57d005c2e370488)

$\redD{10}{:}{\blueE{50}}$ is $\blueE{50}$ ticks from $\redD{10}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just before 11. The long minute hand points to 10.  Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e2f7374d8bbe962a3b7fb9a35e9ae5274c03fe74)

Notice the hour hand is past $10{:}00$ but not quite to $11{:}00$.

$\redD{1}{:}{\blueE{50}}$ is $\blueE{50}$ ticks from $\redD{1}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just before 2. The long minute hand points to 10.  Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b245ca645985b66af3bde476751c9267ca20178d)

Notice the hour hand is past $1{:}00$ but not quite to $2{:}00$.

Here is the completed table:

Time | Clock
- | - | -
$10{:}10$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 10. The long minute hand points to 2. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/233a2549eb7937210bed3d49341b994e6ef0e2bb)
$10{:}50$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just before 11. The long minute hand points to 10. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a8151e45afe3dc091d5fc16e40c64a60c68f07c5)
$1{:}50$ | ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just before 2. The long minute hand points to 10. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4e677db749e12d968734ad1c5be4d1e28e2abe4f)

question.content:
**Match the clocks to the correct time.**

[[â˜ƒ matcher 1]]

right: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is just before 11. The long minute hand points to 10. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/233a2549eb7937210bed3d49341b994e6ef0e2bb)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 10. The long minute hand points to 2. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a8151e45afe3dc091d5fc16e40c64a60c68f07c5)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is just before 2. The long minute hand points to 10. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4e677db749e12d968734ad1c5be4d1e28e2abe4f)
